Class Automaton

java.lang.Object
Automaton
Direct Known Subclasses:
ElementaryAutomaton, TotalisticAutomaton
public abstract class Automaton extends Object
The class Automaton inherits from Rule and Generation, and creates either totalistic or elementary rules.
Author:
MuhammadAli

  • Method Details

    • createAutomaton

      public static Automaton createAutomaton(CellularAutomaton ca, int ruleNum, Generation initial) throws RuleNumException
      createAutomaton decides whether to create a a totalistic or elementary automaton based on the given CellularAutomaton.
      Parameters:
      ca - Tells the method to create either an elementary or totalistic rule.
      ruleNum - Will be passed to ElementaryAutomaton or TotalisticAutomaton for their constructor.
      initial - Generation to be passed to elementary or totalistic automaton constructor.
      Returns:
      Automaton of either type elementary or totalistic
      Throws:
      RuleNumException - if ruleNum is out of bounds for given CellularAutomaton ca.

    • evolve

      public int evolve(int numSteps)
      This method evolves the generations by the given number of steps.
      Parameters:
      numSteps - gives the number of steps to evolve the generation by.
      Returns:
      the number of steps evolved.

    • getGeneration

      public Generation getGeneration(int stepNum)
      This method returns the generation at the given step number.
      Parameters:
      stepNum - The index of the generation to get.
      Returns:
      The generation at the give step number.

    • getCurrentGeneration

      public Generation getCurrentGeneration()
      This will return the latest generation.
      Returns:
      the most recent generation.

    • getRuleNum

      public int getRuleNum()
      This will get the rule Number of the Automaton.
      Returns:
      the rule number of the Automaton.

    • getTotalSteps

      public int getTotalSteps()
      Gives the total number of evolutions made in the automaton.
      Returns:
      the total number of evolutions made in the automaton.

      public void saveEvolution(String filename) throws IOException
      Saves an evolution to a file.
      Parameters:

      Throws:
      IOException - necessary for FileWriter.

    • ruleTableString

      public String ruleTableString()
      Makes a ruleTable of the rule, either totalistic or elementary.
      Returns:
      String with two lines, depending on whether elementary or totalistic was called.
